title: Drawing, "Figures on a Sand Dune", 1895–96
inscribed: Inscribed in charcoal ? with color notations and other fragmentary writing throughout.
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view shows crest of a sand dune, on which is a group of men, and above which project three masts of a schooner flying an inverted flag.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Figures on a Sand Dune", 1895–96.
1895–96. Charcoal on paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-213.
